# Set up microservice
RUN wget -O sdno-driver-huawei-l3vpn-1.0.0-RC0.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1020/org/openo/sdno/driver-huawei-l3vpn/l3vpndriver-deployment/1.0.0-RC0/l3vpndriver-deployment-1.0.0-RC0.zip
RUN unzip -o -B sdno-driver-huawei-l3vpn-1.0.0-RC0.zip
EXPOSE 8533
